title: Curriculum Development Competency Enhancement: XR·AI-Based Second Language Instruction Using Task-Centered Language Teaching

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in foundational scientific terminology and digital device utilization
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners achieve 80% or higher proficiency in communicating scientific terminology in a second language during task performance.
Learners engage in contextually relevant role-playing with AI conversational agents at least three times in an XR-based simulation environment.
Learners correct 70% or more of language usage errors through a feedback system and develop self-directed learning plans.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
